title: Are the Steelers the Best in the AFC, the Chargers Blow Another Lead, and Tua Tagovailoa’s Debut
description:
Chris and Warren kick off the show discussing the 7-0 Pittsburgh Steelers (01:00). Later, they talk about who is at fault for the Chargers’ back-to-back blown leads (06:00), Tua Tagovailoa’s NFL debut for the Dolphins (16:00), and more.
Hosts: Chris Vernon and Warren Sharp
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
